original_text: does not oppress anyone, but restores to the debtor his pledge, commits no robbery, gives his bread to the hungry and covers the naked with a garment,
korean_text: 사람을 학대하지 아니하며 빚진 자의 저당물을 돌려 주며 강탈하지 아니하며 주린 자에게 음식물을 주며 벗은 자에게 옷을 입히며

sentences.original_text: but restores to the debtor his pledge
gives his bread to the hungry
and covers the naked with a garment,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 헐벗은 자에게 옷을 입혀 줍니다
